product_name: CliniqueAll About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Cleanser - Mild Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique's bestselling All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Cleanser is quick-rinsing and non-drying. Now in a mini travel size.
details: DetailsBenefitsMild - Dry Combination Skin (Type 2).Soft, non-drying lather loosens surface flakes, removes dirt and debris, and protects skin's natural moisture balance.Quick-rinsing formula leaves skin clean, comfortable, refreshed - never taut or dry.Formulated with sucrose, known to calm and soothe skin.Dermatologist tested.Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ or oil-free Gel. Each step is customized for your skin type.More sustainable packaging: Bottle is 96% plant-derived plastic. Cap is 25% post-consumer recycled material.How to recycle: This bottle is widely recyclable. Rinse the bottle, reattach the cap, then place in a recycling bin.Non-acnegenic.Allergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSGlutenFragranceItem 2590259How To UseUse face cleanser twice a day, morning & night. Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Massage over makeup-free face & neck. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry. Follow with Clinique Clarifying Face Lotion 2; Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+ to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Sarcosinate, Tea-Cocoyl Glutamate, Di-PPG-2 Myreth-10 Adipate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sucrose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Triethylmonium Dimethicone PEG-8 Succinate, Butylene Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-7, Laureth-2, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopheryl Acetate, EDTA, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use face cleanser twice a day, morning & night. Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Massage over makeup-free face & neck. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry. Follow with Clinique Clarifying Face Lotion 2; Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+ to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I couldn't go without this face wash!
reviews.comments: Great face wash!

reviews.headline: Gentle on the skin
reviews.comments: I've tried many facial washes, so far this has been the best I've used.

reviews.headline: I would but again
reviews.comments: Love how it feels and cleans face so good. I love the gel cleaner better seems to last longer .

reviews.headline: Burns my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I picked this up because i was told this brand helps dry and sensitive skin. Every time I tried this out it burns and irritates my skin. I'm returning this today.  If you have sensitive skin, I'd be careful with this one.

reviews.headline: Complete waste of my hard earned money
reviews.comments: I mistakenly bought this item thinking it was the same one I had a sample of. This product is like a lotion, doesn't foam up at ALL and doesn't take off any make up. It also doesn't do a thing for my face at all. I wish I could get my money back.

reviews.headline: Nice soap
reviews.comments: It's a nice liquid soap, foams easily, gentle on skin. Little bit goes a long way, doesn't leave any film or dryness.

reviews.headline: Best Oily Skin Wash Ever!
reviews.comments: This stuff is the best! I've been using this for about 3 years now, and I will never buy another face wash! I have oily skin in the summertime, and more combination skin in the colder months, but it works for my skin year round! It really gets your face clean, and one bottle will last me almost six months! A little goes a long way. For the longevity, i believe the price is justified! I swear by this face wash!

reviews.headline: Cleanser
reviews.comments: It works great for my face. It's not harsh. It's very mild for my complexion and for my skin tone. I love it. Thank you.

reviews.headline: Perfect for me
reviews.comments: I love this facial soap! If you need a gentle facial soap, I recommend this.

reviews.headline: A favorite of mine
reviews.comments: I have used thus for years and love using this cleanser.  My skin is very dry and my skin does not feel dry after using this cleanser.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I use this on a regular bases.

reviews.headline: I love it and don't use nothing else
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: My favorite cleanser !!!
reviews.comments: This has been the only line of products that has worked for my acne and sensitive skin! I have tried literally everything. I think they key is knowingn what skin type you have with this line bc they have many other ones for different skin types. Consistency is key! I only gave it 4 stars bc I feel the lid should be secured somehow when shipping it was loose when i took it out and some product did leak out.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I had stopped using the 3 step for awhile. My face showed it. I love the simple steps. And results. This soap takes wee bit n cleans well. It is not harsh on skin. Love it

reviews.headline: Clogged pores
reviews.comments: I've known better when the CLINIQUE sales associate recommended this item. This is a waste of money and has caused me so many breakouts. I've never had this many clogged pores. I have decent skin. I just wanted a gentle cleanser, but this has completely messed up my skin. Do not buy!

reviews.headline: Broke me out unfortunately
reviews.comments: I wish this hadn't broken me out but it did it also felt very sticky and I got itchy and got little dots around my nose if it had fragrance in it that's prob why cuz I recently found out my skin doesn't like fragrance

reviews.headline: This Comes With Acne Set!
reviews.comments: So This Is Good To Use But It Is Greasy On The Skin And Also The Acne Is Seven Day Trial And Not Bad AT All And It Is The Greatest Because It Was Not Harsh On My Skin Tone And Also It Is Kind Of Like Proactive But It Also Like A Clean And Clear Type

reviews.headline: My go to cleanser
reviews.comments: I wash my face everyday with this. I love this cleanser.

reviews.headline: I will forever buy this product!
reviews.comments: I have been using this brand for my face wash ever since my nana first bought it for me! Has keep my face clean for years and I won't use any other product!

reviews.headline: I loved!!
reviews.comments: Excelent!!

faceoff_positive.comments: This soap is so good. It makes my face feel soft and clean and I know it's doing it's job. It doesn't dry out my face like other soaps and I feel great when I use it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Liquid Facial Soap is fantabulous

faceoff_negative.comments: I just tried this product and very upset. First, I received a sample of "Liquid Facial Soap". I loved it. Since I have very dry skin, when I made a purchase I picked "very to very dry" . But this was very different from the sample that I got. I guess the sample was for other skin type. This dry/very dry skin type product is not a soap. It looks like lotion and feels like lotion. Unlike other skin type, this one does not foam.( because it's lotion!) They shouldn't call this "soap". This product should be called something like "milk cleanser" etc.,
faceoff_negative.headline: This is not a soap. It's a lotion.

rollup.name: All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Cleanser - Mild Mini
